forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
